function.name: listfolders
function.description: Returns an iterable containing the names of all subfolders in the folder specified by uri. Returns empty if uri is empty or not a folder.If the optional parameter recursive is set to true, it will also return all sub-subfolders.The function always returns even the folders that are not accessible (but visible) for current user. If optional parameter showaccess is set to true (default is false), the list of pairs is returned. Each pair contains key which is the name of the directory and the boolean value which means if the folder is accessible or not.
